title: NoSleep Podcast S6E06 - Halloween 2015
description:
It's episode 6 of Season 6 - Our Special 2015 Halloween Show with six tales about All Hallow's Eve.
"Through The Mask" written by Jeff McFarland and read by Mike DelGaudio & Elle Hama & Alexis Bristowe. (Story starts at 00:04:30)
"On the Eve" written by J.P. Carver and read by Nikolle Doolin & Erika Sanderson & Nichole Goodnight & Mike DelGaudio. (Story starts at 00:19:20)
"Burn" written by C.K.Walker and read by David Cummings & Jessica McEvoy & Elle Hama. (Story starts at 00:40:00)
"I Dare You" written by Grant Riley and read by Mike DelGaudio & Jesse Cornett & Peter Lewis & Jeff Clement. (Story starts at 01:03:30)
"89.1" written by Jimmy Juliano and read by David Ault & Jeff Clement & Rima Chaddha Mycynek & Nichole Goodnight & Alexis Bristowe & Erika Sanderson & Peter Lewis. (Story starts at 01:29:10)
"The Last Halloween" written by William Dalphin and read by Peter Lewis & Nikolle Doolin & Erika Sanderson. (Story starts at 01:52:30)

"Through The Mask" written by Jeff McFarland and read by Mike DelGaudio & Elle Hama & Alexis Bristowe. (Story starts at 00:04:30)
